title: Where can I take burned out light bulbs? Safe way to dispose of them?
text:
Regular bulbs can be thrown out with your trash. I usually place mine
in a paper bag to prevent puncturing plastic trash bags.



New Hanover County bans fluorescent bulbs from its landfill, although
residents are allowed to dispose of four per week per resident.



Here's a link to landfill rules:
http://www.nhcgov.com/Environmental/Pages/Disposal-Facility-Rules.aspx
